Credits

Uploaded By:

Conservation Biology Institute

Description

Locations of trees within the 4-ha plot study area within the Wind River Field Station. Data is styled by Diameter at Breast Height (DBH), defined as:Â  diameter (cm) at 1.3 m above ground

Attribute Data

Attribute Attribute Alias Attribute Description
DATACODE DATACODE WRFS database subsection
DBH DBH diameter (cm) at 1.3 m above ground
DISTANCE DISTANCE radial distance from tower (m)
Easting Easting Easting
F14 F14 F14
FID FID
Northing Northing Northing
PLOT PLOT 25 meter square subplots
SPECIES SPECIES first two letters of genus and species
STATUS STATUS 1 = live, 6 = dead
Shape Shape
TAG TAG unique tree ID
X X X distance from origin south west corner
Y Y Y distance from origin south west corner
YEAR YEAR 1994 year of establishment
Z Z elevation change from tower base
